writer.name: 查尔斯·M·舒尔茨 Charles M. Schulz

this_title: The Charlie Brown and Snoopy Show Season 2
trans_title: 查理·布朗和史努比秀 第二季
introduction: Snoopy breaks his foot and must wear a cast, which proves complicated when he has to play for Peppermint Patty's baseball team. Meanwhile, Woodstock grows a moxia.cc beanstalk to the sky, where he and Snoopy meet a cookie-hoarding giant. Finally, the youngest of the Van Pelts has to deal with various problems.
chinese_title: 查理·布朗和史努比秀 第二季
foreign_title: The Charlie Brown and Snoopy Show Season 2
